OFFICE MEMORANDUM

Subject: Authorization to provide CCTV footage to/government agencies and
other entities for inquiry/investigation purposes.

Para 3.10.1 of AvSec Order No. 2/2023 dated 30,1,2023, reads as “No
recorded information/data shall be provided by the custodian in stored media or
any other form including print without the written permission of the Director
General, BCAS or any other officer authorized by him on this behalf.”

2.In furtherance of the above, all jurisdictional Regional Directors, BCAS are
hereby authorized to scrutinize the requests, for providing CCTV footages,
received from Customs, Police, ASG, other Goverment Agencies and such entities,
who are working in the security restricted area of an airport with approved
security programme. The regional directors shall satisfy themselves that the
permission for issuance of recorded footage is provided for inquiry or
investigation purposes only. The copy of such permissions be marked to
Directorate of Operations and Support Services at BCAS HQ for records.

3. This Office Memorandum shall supersede Office Memorandum No. CAS-03-
2023 /Ops-lIl/Div/Misc/E-236995 dated 28.3.2023.
